name: Those Nights at Rachel's Demo
description:
Welcome future night-guard!

You will make means of our accurately placed defenses, scroll through our oh-so-accurate security tablet, while guarding the building at all costs. It's a simple job- really.

But uh- one small detail.

The animatronics may want to perform after hours- it's not that bad, it really isn't. Uh- just make sure they don't find you, kinda like a game of the old fashioned hide and seek. I'm sure you understand!

Other than that, enjoy your brand new job here at Doug's n' Rachel's, and as always- be sure to wear a smile!

Those Nights at Rachel's is a tribute game for the sadly cancelled Those Nights at Fredbear's, both inspired from the Five Nights at Freddy's franchise

FEATURES

  • New characters!
  • New setting!
  • New and custom mechanics!
  • Custom voice acting!
  • An unheard lore for you all to discover!
  • Partial free roam!
  • And many more!

!WARNING!

You need a fairly decent computer to play the game!

Here are the specs:

  • Desktop PC
  • Windows 7 64-bit or later.
  • Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • 4 GB RAM or more

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Will the game be on Mac? No
Will the game be on any mobile devices? No
Can I beta test? No

Credits:

Nick (Nikson) - Creator, Developer, Programmer, Writer, Modeler
Smashing_Renders - Character Modeler, Helper
Expand - Phone call and Story writer, idea guy.
Kane Carter - General Help
Patrick Richards - Voice Actor
